article: Many people like traveling for their holiday. They go to hills , seaside or forests. Some people like _ , so they like to visit some old interesting places. One of the holidays is _ "Package" holiday.That is, you just _ the money, and the travel agency will plan _ for you, the ticket for the train or plane, the hotel, the activities, and so on.
